body:
closes #29014

See https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/25353#issuecomment-1041868116

This commit changes the default behavior of
```console
$ spack external find
```
from searching all the possible packages Spack knows about to search only for the ones tagged as being a "build-tool". It also introduces a `--all` option to restore the old behavior.

Modifications:
- [x] `spack external find` looks for packages tagged as `build-tools` or `core-packages`
- [x] Tag semantic for `spack external find` is changed to be OR instead of AND
- [x] Added `--all` argument to restore the old behavior
- [x] Tagged a few packages so they are searched by default
title: spack external find: change default behavior
